mapper.sql: a.id AS "id" , a.title AS "title" , a.content AS "content" , a.type AS "type", a.user_id AS "userId", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", u1.name AS "createBy.name", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", u2.name AS "updateBy.name", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u1.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.update_by
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_notify a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_notify( id, title, type, content, user_id, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{type}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_notify SET id=#{id}, title=#{title}, type=#{type}, content=#{content}, user_id=#{userId}, status=#{status}, update_by=#{updateBy.id}, update_date=#{updateDate}, remarks=#{remarks}, del_flag=#{delFlag} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sys_notify SET del_flag = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
